channel.title: Help please
channel.description: Okay, I have the DAT Files for a Ares set i found on this website. I'm using the source Impozzes source and client, how do i add the item so i can use it in game.. please tell me here, And message me if you can do it for me. Thanks

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Aerocrash Aerocrash
item.description:
@Aerocrash wrote:

Put the .dat files in your clients Model folder. Then login to your server and type the .dat model id in your chat box. For example if the file was named 55555.dat in your servers chat box type: add model 55555

Read full topic
